name: arctovish

abilities.name: water-absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.description: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: slush-rush
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

description:
Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its
surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey
afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.
